column6: "BIZARRE LOVE TRIANGLE" Part 4 (of 4) A figure from the X-Men's past has returned to the mansion seeking sanctuary within the walls of Xavier's home. The guest, however, isn't getting the warmest welcome. Could the X-Men really turn away this desperate mutant and will they be able to forgive themselves if they do?
column8: | colorist:Liquid Graphics | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | inker:Danny K. Miki | writer:Peter Milligan | letterer:Cory Petit
